definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: If be the fade of little scope only, so complete and OK oneself are its complementary color .
sentences.chinese: 假如只是小範圍的掉色，那麼完全可以自己爲它補色。

sentences.english: Complementary colors make white lights when two are mixed.
sentences.chinese: 當兩種顏色混合時，互補色合成白光。

sentences.english: The use of complementary colors is an important aspect of aesthetically pleasing art and graphic design.
sentences.chinese: 使用互補色是美觀的藝術設計和平面設計的重要手段。

sentences.english: In general, any region in the visual field tends to induce its complementary color in neighboring areas.
sentences.chinese: 通常情況下，任何視覺區域都會趨於臨域的補色。

sentences.english: Complementary colors are really bad for text.
sentences.chinese: 互補色是真的不好的文本。

sentences.english: Red and green are complementary colors.

sentences.chinese: 因此這種方法被稱爲補色偏振體視。

sentences.english: Inspire Me helps identifying monochromatic, adjacent and complementary colour.
sentences.chinese: 激勵着我，幫助識別單色，相鄰的互補色。

sentences.english: The rectangle or tetradic color scheme uses four colors arranged into two complementary pairs.
sentences.chinese: 矩形色系或者四色系是指由兩對互補色組成的顏色。

sentences.english: The anaglyph stereoscopic TV system is Simple, practical and easy to be popularized .
sentences.chinese: 互補色分像法立體電視系統簡便實用，利於推廣普及。

sentences.english: Photos can be viewed either as an anaglyph, interlaced, side by side, or as a cross over 3D image.
sentences.chinese: 圖片可以以立體補色圖或者以交叉的3D圖來觀看。

sentences.english: The use of a good contact print is superior to that of an anaglyphic projection.
sentences.chinese: 使用好的曬印像片比使用互補色立體投影還好。
